channel.title: CVE Feed for SharpCompress -- SharpCompress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SharpCompress -- SharpCompress

item.title: CVE-2018-1002206|2024-09-17T03:29:09.493Z -- sharpcompress -- sharpcompress
item.description: SharpCompress before 0.21.0 is vulnerable to directory traversal, allowing attackers to write to arbitrary files via a ../ (dot dot slash) in a Zip archive entry that is mishandled during extraction. This vulnerability is also known as 'Zip-Slip'.
